text.text: The property is in an area that has long held the interest of geologists because of its close proximity to the high-grade underground Macassa gold mine. The team is encouraged by numerous outcropping high-grade gold veins at Eby-Otto that have assayed up to 14.03 g/t Au in past sampling/drilling
The company is optimistic on the future of the property, especially in light of geologist Doug Robinsonâ€™s continued involvement.
